interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Thomas & Friends: Blue Mountain Mystery the Movie
Review Date: 2018/10/28
Store: Michael Brandon  (Actor),     David Bedella  (Actor),     Greg Tiernan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
Product Description: ['Product Description', "When trouble strikes at the Blue Mountain Quarry, Thomas is sent to help his Narrow Gauge engine friends. While shunting and hauling, he discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Thomas is determined to get to the bottom of the mystery but discovering the truth is harder than he imagined! Will Thomas be able to help his new friend? Or will the little engine be sent away from Sodor forever? Find out in Thomas' most mysterious adventure yet, a movie the whole family will love!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', 'Thomas the tank engine and his railway friends learn all about how rumors spread and the importance of getting all the facts before leaping to judgment in', 'Blue Mountain Mystery', '. When Sir Topham Hatt sends Thomas off to help the narrow-gauge engines at Blue Mountain Quarry after Paxton is injured by an unstable bridge, Thomas discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Some sleuthing reveals that green engine Luke is hiding because he once did something very bad; but what that something is remains a mystery. Thomas decides to find out exactly what happened, but his detective work yields some unintended consequences that just might get Luke thrown off of Sodor Island. This', 'Thomas & Friends', 'movie acquaints young viewers with the concept of standard and narrow-gauge tracks and engines and introduces new friends Owen the traction engine, who pulls heavy loads up the quarry incline; little green engine Luke; Merrick the sleepy crane; and track car Winston, who makes odd sounds and has a long way to go before becoming a really useful member of the railway. (Ages 2 to 6)', '--Tami Horiuchi']
Average Rating: 4.8

Joseph May  (Actor),     Jonathan Broadbent  (Actor),     David Stoten  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
["Shiver me timbers! Surprises await Thomas and his friends as they dig up their most daring adventure yet. Unearthing an old pirate ship, Thomas is on the hunt for Sodor's lost treasure. When Thomas rocks the boat with some new friends, trouble soon rushes in. Will Thomas track down the treasure in time or will Sailor John set sail with it? Join Thomas & Friends™ in this explosive movie adventure!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Never Overlook A Little Engine Music Video', 'Never Overlook A Little Engine Music Video', 'We Make A Team Together Music Video', 'We Make A Team Together Music Video', 'Guess Who? ['Product Description', 'See Thomas & Friends™ like never before in this new action-packed movie. Follow Thomas as he discovers Hiro, an abandoned engine from a faraway land. Fearing that Hiro will be scrapped, Thomas enlists the help of many friends, but mishaps, mistakes and one boastful engine could foil their rescue plans. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Enjoys family-friendly animated content with nostalgic themes, particularly classic characters and franchises that resonate with children and promote family bonding.
- **Target Audience:** Holds a strong preference for content designed for kids, often connecting with family activities or engaging with grandchildren, emphasizing wholesome entertainment.
- **Purchasing Behavior:** Actively seeks deals and promotions on high-quality media purchases, favoring well-reviewed products in the kids and family category to ensure enjoyable experiences. The user recently purchased a highly-rated animated movie that embodies this commitment to quality family entertainment.
- **Content Preference:** Selects engaging films and shows that appeal to both children and adults, reinforcing the value of quality content for family gatherings. Demonstrates consistent enthusiasm for chosen media, as shown by positive reviews.
- **Format Preference:** Open to various formats that enhance viewing experiences, particularly valuing high-quality audio-visual components and accompanying bonus features.
- **Engagement Style:** Expresses satisfaction through enthusiastic reviews, reflecting appreciation for media that brings joy during shared viewing moments with grandchildren.

This user prioritizes high-quality animated media that fosters close family connections through shared experiences while remaining conscientious about value-driven purchasing decisions. Their latest acquisition highlights a commitment to selecting films that are both entertaining and educational for young viewers.
